Question
========
  
It is known that 8% of all men in the Netherlands are color blind. Based on an online test performed among 200 randomly selected male students,  20 of them turned out to be color blind. Test the null hypothesis that male students do not differ from the population of Dutch men. Use a significance level of 5%.
  
Answerlist
----------
* p = 0.298 ($H_{0}$ is not rejected)
* p = 0.347 ($H_{0}$ is not rejected)
* p = 0.298 ($H_{0}$ is accepted)
* p = 0.347 ($H_{0}$ is accepted)



Solution
========

Answerlist
----------
* Correct
* Incorrect
* Incorrect
* Incorrect
